bug.short_desc: REFAC: Provide Dependencies through Class Interface

long_desc.thetext: There is already a dependency interface at generator.code.Class (dependencies()). But it is used in parallel with the old interface of the DependencyLoader. Any duplication of functionality in the generator should be removed and the DependencyLoader itself removed, and all code should use the class interface. Any amendments to that end should be applied to the class code.

I'm closing this bug. The main class-specific dependency functions are now available through the Class class. The DependencyLoader still exists, stripped down, but still contains a few convenience functions that work on collections of classes (getClassList, sortClasses, ...), or add knowledge from the config (getCombinedDeps). I leave that for now, as I don't have a good idea yet where these would fit in. If that changes, I'll open a dedicated bug to remove DependencyLoader.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
